Question
========
What is the main benefit of using automated testing in the SDLC?

Answerlist
----------
* Reduces manual testing efforts
* Increases deployment speed
* Enhances user interface design
* Improves requirement gathering
* Simplifies project management

Solution
========
Automated testing reduces manual testing efforts, allowing teams to quickly identify and fix defects, thus improving overall software quality.
